author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

- Switch to the json format supported by the built in Chrome trace viewer.
- Rework the non web json format.

#### PR validation:

Running some simple trace jobs through Chrome worked. Unit tests pass.

resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1676
resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1677
resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1697
title: Switch to chrome trace format for Tracer log viewing
